name: Sir Smilee's Diamond Hunt!
description:
Join Sir Smilee in his game show about hunting diamonds in a maze!

A submission for Beginners Circle Jam #4 

Credits

  • Art: Chem https://sleepyfroge.itch.io/
  • Music
    • Menu

      Piano Sway by Jay Man - OurMusicBox
      https://www.our-music-box.com
  • Sounds Effects
    • Crowd sound
      https://tabletopaudio.com/film_noir_sp.html
    • Level ambient

    • Diamond sound
